user_question: How does 5G technology impact smart cities, and can you generate an image of a futuristic smart city utilizing 5G?
final_answer: 5G technology enhances smart cities by providing faster data speeds, lower latency, and improved connectivity, enabling advanced IoT applications and real-time data processing. Image of a futuristic smart city utilizing 5G generated. 5G improves IoT applications by providing higher bandwidth, supporting more connected devices, and enabling real-time data transmission.
